name: Bratz Rock Angelz
description:
uk.playstation.com (from Ad Blurbs)

Join the four Bratz on an adventure to create their very own fashion magazine.

If you're a fan of the Bratz, Bratz Rock Angelz will be right up your catwalk! Explore your
"passion for fashion" in a unique interactive adventure game. You'll be immersed in the
Bratz World as the girls embark on a series of voyages in search of intriguing stories that
will provide inspiration for their very own fashion magazine.
  • Play as any of the four Bratz Girls while exploring different adventures

  • Customise all of the Bratz girls' hair, make-up, and outfits as you shop for the latest
    fashions

  • Chat face-to-face with the Bratz characters in their own world
